page.title: 13RESTAVON CARAVAN PARK
page.content:
A CARAVAN SITE IN BIGGIN HILL
There are about 64 caravans housing many people on the Restavon Caravan Site in Berry's Green. The caravan site is roughly two acres in size. The caravans look like small bungalows and some have gardens. Around the caravan site there are some footpaths, bungalows, fields, woods and farms. The caravan site only allows pet cats. Three people work at the caravan site, they keep the place tidy, look after the shops and bring the stock. There are two shops around the caravan site. About 350 cars pass the caravan site per day. In the caravan site shop they sell sweets, alcohol, tobacco, biscuits, fruit, vegetables and necessities.
